title: Chiseled
description: The woods are heating up with CHISELED!  It's Grace's turn to find her happily-ever-after ... but she's fallen for the reclusive mountain man named Bear!  When a shocking package arrives at the doorstep of her cottage, she knows her world has just turned upside down-- X 2! #TheBeardGangIsBack #BabiesForDays #IsThisRealLifeEven #TheFertileMountian #iLostCount #MeToo #TooMuch #NeverTooMuch #GimmeDatBaby
author: Frankie Love
